name: defra-identity-hapi-plugin
description: A hapi auth plugin to allow easy integration with DEFRA's Identity Management system

scripts.lint: (standard --verbose | snazzy) && echo 'All lint rules passed' || true
scripts.postinstall: cp -n demo/.env.template demo/.env || echo 'Note: Error creating demo/.env. File may already exist'

author: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs
